title: Detroit Pistons - Wikipedia
snippet: The Detroit Pistons are an American professional basketball team based in Detroit. The Pistons compete in the National Basketball Association (NBA) as a member of the Central Division of the Eastern Conference. The team plays its home games at Little Caesars Arena, located in Midtown Detroit.

title: Where Do The Detroit Pistons Play?
snippet: Where Do The Detroit Pistons Play? Little Caesars Arena is a multi-purpose arena in Midtown Detroit, MI.

title: Official Little Caesars Arena Tickets & Venue Information | 313 Presents
snippet: Experience the thrill of live events at Little Caesars Arena in The District Detroit. Home to the Detroit Red Wings and Detroit Pistons, Little Caesars Arena hosts an array of sporting events, concerts, comedians and family shows.
